short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically downloads images when hovering with Shift key pressed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Image Downloader: Save web images instantly!

Effortlessly download images while browsing. Just hold Shift, hover over any picture, and it's saved automatically. No clicks needed! Perfect for researchers, designers, and casual browsers alike. Streamline your image collection process with this fast, user-friendly extension.

Features:
- One-step downloads: Shift + Hover
- Works on any website
- No cluttered interface
- Saves time and clicks

Simplify your online image gathering today!
